summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Contatti page (/contatti) as requested. All 11 specified features verified and working correctly including hero section, Google Maps embed, Orari di Apertura (09:00-17:30), contact links (telefono, WhatsApp, email), Come Arrivare section, 4 booking channels, 6 'Perché Scegliere Noi' reasons, final CTA section, Navbar links (desktop/mobile), Footer links, and full navigation between all pages.
passed_tests: Contatti page (/contatti) loads with hero section and title 'Contatti'
Sezione 'Dove Siamo' with Google Maps embed (data-testid='contatti-google-maps') visible and functional
'Apri in Google Maps' button with correct external link attributes (target=_blank, rel=noopener noreferrer)
4 distance cards displayed (~300m traghetti, ~100m supermercati, ~30m Poste, ~100m banca)
Address card shows: Marina di Cala Mangiavolpe, Piazza Umberto I, 07024 La Maddalena (SS)
Sezione 'Orari di Apertura' shows 09:00 apertura card (data-testid='orario-apertura')
Sezione 'Orari di Apertura' shows 17:30 chiusura card (data-testid='orario-chiusura')
Sezione 'Contatti Diretti' - Telefono link (tel:+393318659946) functional
Sezione 'Contatti Diretti' - WhatsApp link (wa.me) with security attributes
Sezione 'Contatti Diretti' - Email link (mailto:info@rentalboatcalamangiavolpe.it) functional
WhatsApp CTA 'Risposta rapida' button (data-testid='contatti-wa-cta') visible
Sezione 'Come Arrivare' - Traghetto card (data-testid='arrive-ferry') with ferry info
Sezione 'Come Arrivare' - Auto card (data-testid='arrive-car') with parking info
Sezione 'Prenotazioni' with 4 booking channels (Online/WhatsApp/Telefono/Di persona)
All 4 booking channel cards visible (data-testid='booking-channel-0' to 'booking-channel-3')
Sezione 'Perché Scegliere Noi' with 6 reason cards (data-testid='why-us-0' to 'why-us-5')
Final CTA section with WhatsApp button (data-testid='contatti-cta-wa')
Final CTA section with 'Chiama Ora' button (data-testid='contatti-cta-call')
Navbar desktop 'Contatti' link (data-testid='nav-link-contatti') working and highlighted
Navbar mobile 'Contatti' link (data-testid='mobile-nav-contatti') working and highlighted
Footer 'Contatti' link (data-testid='footer-link-contatti') working
Navigation from Navbar to /contatti successful
Navigation from Footer to /contatti successful
Navigation between all pages working (Home, Itinerari, Prezzi, FAQ, Prenotazioni, Contatti)
Mobile responsive layout working correctly across all sections
Mobile menu toggle (data-testid='mobile-menu-toggle') functional
Floating WhatsApp button (data-testid='whatsapp-float') visible
All 6 WhatsApp links have proper security attributes (target=_blank, rel=noopener noreferrer)
FareHarbor 'Prenota Ora' CTA in Navbar correctly linked
Footer Google Maps embed (data-testid='google-maps-embed') present
No console errors detected
All data-testid attributes properly implemented for automated testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 6 pages of the Rental Boat Cala Mangiavolpe website have been fully tested (Home, Itinerari, Prezzi, FAQ, Prenotazioni, Contatti). All navigation, external links, responsive design, and data-testid attributes are working correctly. No issues found.
